description.forgot_password: No worries, we’ll send you reset instructions.
description.login: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
description.register: Sign up in less than 2 minutes.
description.reset_password: Your new password must be different to previously used passwords.
description.email_verify: We send a verification link to the email address you provided.

request_password.title: Request sent
request_password.description: Check your email to continue with the password recovery process.

password_updated.title: Password updated
password_updated.description: Your password has been successfully changed. You can now log in with your new password.

request_email_verify.title: Verification email resent
request_email_verify.description: Please check your inbox for the verification email and follow the instructions to verify your account.
